scripts.start: npm run tailwind:css && set NODE_ENV=production && node ./bin/www
scripts.devStart: npm run tailwind:css && set NODE_ENV=development && nodemon ./bin/www --ext js,json,ejs
scripts.debug: npm run tailwind:css && set NODE_ENV=development && nodemon --inspect ./bin/www
scripts.prodDebug: npm run tailwind:css && set NODE_ENV=development && node ./bin/www
